archimate:Device.name: High-Speed Desktop Scanner (HDSS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Departments: records management, • Purpose: Digitizing patient records, invoices, reports, forms, and other essential hospital documents for secure digital storage and workflow efficiency.
Specifications:
• Scan Speed: o Minimum 50–80 pages per minute (ppm) o Duplex scanning (single-pass double-sided scanning) • Optical Resolution: o Minimum 600 dpi (dots per inch) for high-quality text and image scanning • ADF (Automatic Document Feeder) Capacity: o Minimum 80–100 sheets to handle bulk scanning efficiently • Paper Handling: o Supports A4, letter, legal, and smaller document sizes o Handles varied paper thicknesses (standard paper, receipts, ID cards, insurance forms) • Connectivity Options: o USB 3.0 for fast, direct connection o Ethernet for shared office use o Wi-Fi for wireless scanning capabilities • File Output Formats: o PDF, searchable PDF, TIFF, JPEG, PNG, BMP o Supports OCR (Optical Character Recognition) for converting scanned documents into editable/searchable text. o Higher OCR Accuracy (AI-Based OCR Engine) – Advanced AI-driven OCR improves text recognition in handwritten notes and older medical documents. • Scanning Features: o Automatic Blank Page Removal o Auto Image Cleanup (deskew, color correction, de-speckling) o Multi-feed detection to prevent paper jams o Auto-Classification & Barcode Recognition – Useful for automatically tagging and categorizing documents (e.g., patient IDs, invoices, forms). o Cloud & Secure Digital Storage Integration – Ensure support for direct cloud uploads (OneDrive, SharePoint, Google Drive, AWS S3, hospital EMR systems). o Touchscreen Interface () – Some high-end scanners include an LCD touchscreen for easier job selection. • Daily Duty Cycle: o Up to 10,000–15,000 pages per day • Software Compatibility: o Compatible with Windows and macOS o Integration with document management systems (DMS), cloud storage, and hospital ERP/EMR systems • Size & Form Factor: o Compact desktop-sized footprint o Approximate dimensions: 12–15 inches (width) x 8–10 inches (depth) x 8 inches (height) • Power Requirements: • Standard 220–240V AC • Durability & Maintenance: o Heavy-duty rollers for high-volume scanning o Replaceable feed rollers for extended lifespan
